Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Los Bracos, you'll be centrally located in Logrono, steps from Museo de la Rioja and minutes from Santiago el Real. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Concatedral Santa Maria de La Redonda and San Bartolome Church.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 71 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature bidets and hair dryers.

Dining
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, a 24-hour front desk, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Planning an event in Logrono? This hotel has 1291 square feet (120 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Museo de la Rioja - 0.1 km / 0 mi
Santiago el Real - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Concatedral Santa Maria de La Redonda - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
San Bartolome Church - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

Bodega Darien - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Finca Valpiedra - 13.5 km / 8.4 mi
Bodegas Marques de Riscal - 14.7 km / 9.1 mi

Bodegas Ysios - 16.3 km / 10.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Logrono (RJL-Agoncillo) - 11.1 km / 6.9 mi
Vitoria (VIT) - 51.9 km / 32.2 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Los Bracos is Vitoria (VIT).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Husa Bracos is Vitoria (VIT) - 51.8 km / 32.2 mi.
